title: Plastic straws are not the problem. : r/mildlyinfuriating - Reddit
body: Plastic is almost 0% of the problem, in fact. The real problem is the global fishing industry, which causes more than 99% of the problems with the ocean and also utilizes slave labor. The fishing nets are designed to kill and are often discarded into the ocean. Also, most of the boats only catch about 30-50% of the target fish and kill the ...
